mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX(tbl_reply idx_tbl_reply) */ rownum rn, rno, bno, reply, replyer, reg_date as regDate, update_date as updateDate FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} AND rno > 0 AND rownum <= #{criteria.amount} * #{criteria.pageNum} ) WHERE rn > #{criteria.amount} * (#{criteria.pageNum} - 1)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{ bno }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply ( rno, bno, reply, replyer ) VALUES ( seq_tbl_reply.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer} )
